name: sbcalfi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, w1))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, w1))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wal(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, w1))

-| wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wal(s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, w1))
-| wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wal(s1, w1))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wal(s1, w0)), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w1)

comment: Move universal quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
